Write-Up Requirements:  
(<5 written pages, visualizations not included)  
-abstract  
-info on what is being replicated + main theoretical argument  
-main hypothesis  
-brief description of data  
-conduct main test  
-present visualizations  
-summarize results  
-critical evaluation:  
  -whether improvements on testing of hypothesis can be made  
  -whether assumptions are valid  
  -conduct robustness checks  
  -propose ways forward on RQ  
  
+ 10 min group presentation w/ Q&A  
  

Our group selected the following paper to replicate:  
  
Siegel, Alexandra A., and Vivienne Badaan. 2020. "# No2Sectarianism: Experimental Approaches to Reducing Sectarian Hate Speech Online." American Political Science Review 114:3, 837-855.
